about_the_game:
Welcome to VELOCIBLASTER, a groundbreaking VR game set in an alternate reality where Velociraptors are the dominant, sentient species. In this world, the catastrophic asteroid never struck Earth, allowing these cunning dinosaurs to evolve and develop advanced technology. Eventually, they took to the skies!



Take flight in high-stakes PvP battles, wielding futuristic blasters equipped with rocket thrusters for dynamic aerial maneuvers. Arm yourself with an array of exotic weapons and power-ups to enhance your tactics and firepower. This isn't just a test of aim, but a strategic showdown. Only the sharpest shooters and the swiftest fliers can dominate the leaderboards.



VELOCIBLASTER takes advantage of vertical gameplay dynamics, allowing you to skillfully maneuver through the air as you navigate intricately-designed maps and engage your enemies. Grab your Blasters and prepare for an adrenaline rush as you master the skies and outmaneuver your rivals.

Arm yourself with an array of exotic weapons and power-ups to enhance your tactics and firepower. This isn't just a test of aim, but a strategic showdown. Only the sharpest shooters and the swiftest fliers can dominate the leaderboards.



VELOCIBLASTER takes advantage of vertical gameplay dynamics, allowing you to skillfully maneuver through the air as you navigate intricately-designed maps and engage your enemies. Grab your Blasters and prepare for an adrenaline rush as you master the skies and outmaneuver your rivals.
name: VELOCIBLASTER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: EVOLUTION. TAKES. FLIGHT. Become a dinosaur and blast away your enemies with high-tech blaster cannons! Engage in high-stakes aerial combat using rocket thrusters to fly. Outmaneuver and outwit your velociraptor rivals in intense, fast-paced battles.
